title: Carhartt Font ID
content:
Hi Guys:

I wonder if anyone knows this two fonts...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111219103219im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Built_to_Last_Logo_4847.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111219103219im_/http:/typophile.com/files/waterproofbreath_3878.jpg)

The third one (from top to bottom) it's Myriad, anyone knows that...

Thanks for your help...

Q™ Says: It's all about the fonts!
author: Qdzign.com.mx

comments.content:
The first one is the letraset face Aachen (Colin Brignall, 1969).

The second is the ITC face Lubalin Graph bold (Herb Lubalin / Ed Benguiat, 1974).

N.

Hey!!

That's great!! thanks a lot Naoiseo...

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!
